alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Northern Cayuga; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:37PM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 40 mph will create considerable blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Northern Cayuga, Oswego, Jefferson, and Lewis counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 1 AM EST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 1 AM to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to a quarter of a mile or less including across open country roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
